title: Blurred Lines
description: FinnI am a monster.A demon lurking in the darkness.My whole life has been consumed with making her suffer, the woman that stole everything from me.I’ve waited seventeen years for vengeance to ruin her like she’s ruined me.I’m going to take everything she loves before I send her to meet the Grim Reaper.But I’m not expecting to be captivated by the rich-brown eyes of her daughter.AnissaHe’s a monster.He’s come into my life and taken everything from me. Everything I have ever loved he’s destroyed.Now he wants to control me. To posses me. To make me his.I want to fight, but there’s something in his blue stare that engulfs me and makes me his prisoner.
author: Mila Crawford
